downloadFile.name: SC Management Pack for BizTalk Server 2020.msi

detailsSection:
System Center Management Pack for BizTalk Server 2020 offers monitoring capabilities for BizTalk artifacts and BizTalk-related platform components. It allows administrators to monitor health state of various BizTalk artifacts such as Send Ports, Orchestrations etc. and platform artifacts such as Host Instances (BizTalk service). Further, this mp includes performance views, diagnostic capability and alerts.

Feature Summary
System Center Management Pack for BizTalk Server 2020 includes the following enhancements:
  • Supports TLS1.2
  • Improvements in the discovery of BizTalk installation when group name is changed.

Release History

systemRequirementsSection:
• Required Software:
    • System Center Operations Manager 2016 Or System Center Operations Manager 2019
    • Microsoft BizTalk Server 2020 or Microsoft BizTalk Server 2016
installInstructionSection: Click the download link on this page to begin the download process for this management pack package. Save the MSI file and run it or run it directly from the download prompt. Please read the MP guide for further installation details.
